actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill to provide a limited antitrust exemption for independent natural gas producer cooperatives.

summary.text: Provides a limited antitrust exemption from State and Federal laws for: (1) actions taken to develop independent natural gas producers' cooperative associations; or (2) actions taken by such associations to implement plans to market natural gas in interstate commerce. Conditions such exemption upon such actions: (1) being necessary to market natural gas; and (2) not being taken for the purpose of reducing competition.

titles.title: A bill to provide a limited antitrust exemption for independent natural gas producer cooperatives.
